front.title: An Interoperability Architecture for Blockchain Gateways

abstract.t: With the increasing interest in the potential use of blockchain systems for virtual assets, there is a need for virtual assets to have mobility across blockchain systems. An interoperability architecture is needed to permit the flow of virtual assets between blockchain systems. The architecture must recognize that there are different blockchain systems, and that the interior constructs in these blockchains maybe incompatible with one another. Gateway nodes perform the transfer of virtual assets between blockchain systems while masking the complexity of the interior constructs of the blockchain that they represent.
